title: 'Bachelor In Paradise' fan favorites Kevin Wendt and Astrid Loch are engaged
text:
Popular "Bachelor in Paradise" alums Kevin Wendt and Astrid Loch are engaged.

Interested in The Bachelor? Add The Bachelor as an interest to stay up to date on the latest The Bachelor news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

Loch, 29, and Wendt, 35, met on the fifth season of the show, which aired in 2018, and officially announced their engagement on Tuesday.

ABC News

Sharing an Instagram post featuring several photographs of the moment Wendt popped the question on August 28th, Loch announced how special it was to her.

"I could have sworn the world stood still in this moment. A moment I’ll never forget. Just you + me," she wrote in the caption.

"@kevin.c.wendt you’ve taught me to love, learn and grow and I can’t believe you’ve chosen me to spend this crazy life with," she added. "Wonder if I’ll ever stop smiling? Probably not. In this together, forever."

Wendt shared a similar sentiment on his own account.

"You’ll never walk alone again. From here on out, we run together. Astrid you are my family, babe. Forever. (See my stories for the adventure/most nervous I’ve been my entire life!!!)"

The two have been pretty solid since reuniting after their dramatic breakup on "Bachelor In Paradise." Loch moved to Canada to live with Wendt late last year.
